meanings.sent1: The neighbors cofinanced the community garden.
meanings.sent2: The siblings cofinanced their new car together.
meanings.sent3: The friends cofinanced a surprise party for their teacher.
meanings.sent4: The team cofinanced the championship game with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The classmates cofinanced a field trip to the zoo.

meanings.definition: To provide financial support for a project in collaboration with others.
meanings.sent1: The company cofinanced the construction of the new office building.
meanings.sent2: The organizations cofinanced the research project on climate change.
meanings.sent3: The group cofinanced a charity event to help animals in need.
meanings.sent4: The community cofinanced the renovation of the local park.
meanings.sent5: The team cofinanced the development of a new mobile app.
